question:
In context with the recent piracy attacks in the Gulf of Guinea, consider the following statements about the region:
  1. It is a part of Pacific Ocean.
  2. Nigeria lies along the Gulf of Guinea.
Which of the above statements is/are true?
explanation: Statement 1 is incorrect: Gulf of Guinea is a part of the Atlantic Ocean. It is located to the west of the African Continent. It is the north- eastern part of the tropical portion of Atlantic Ocean. Rivers like Volta and Niger drain into this gulf. Â Statement 2 is correct: Nigeria is one of the basin countries of the Gulf of Guinea. The Indian foreign ministry is coordinating with its mission in Nigerian capital of Abuja to retrieve the Indian nationals who were kidnapped on the way to Togolese Republic.
